title: Days Plan
description: This blog guides your 14 days journey.

quiz.question: What is covered on Day 1 of the tech industry introduction?
options: A) Tech startup culture
B) History and evolution of technology
C) Different programming languages
quiz._answer: B) History and evolution of technology

quiz.question: What is a major topic on Day 2: Understanding Tech Ecosystem?
options: A) Roles in data science
B) Tech startup culture and major tech hubs
C) Basics of networking
quiz._answer: B) Tech startup culture and major tech hubs

quiz.question: What is a key focus on Day 3: Software Development?
options: A) Real-life scenario: Analyzing a dataset
B) Different programming languages and their use cases
C) Introduction to AI and ML
quiz._answer: B) Different programming languages and their use cases

quiz.question: What topic is discussed on Day 4: Data Science and Analytics?
options: A) Common threats and vulnerabilities
B) Data collection, cleaning, and analysis
C) Cloud service models
quiz._answer: B) Data collection, cleaning, and analysis

quiz.question: Which of the following is covered on Day 5: Cybersecurity?
options: A) Introduction to data science
B) Real-life scenario: Migrating an on-premises application to the cloud
C) Importance of cybersecurity in the tech industry
quiz._answer: C) Importance of cybersecurity in the tech industry

quiz.question: What is a key topic on Day 6: Cloud Computing?
options: A) Introduction to cloud computing
B) Basics of networking
C) Real-life scenario: Designing a user-friendly interface

quiz.question: Which topic is discussed on Day 7: Networking and Infrastructure?
options: A) Key concepts in AI and ML
B) Basics of networking and internet infrastructure
C) Product lifecycle and development process
quiz._answer: B) Basics of networking and internet infrastructure

quiz.question: What is covered on Day 8: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning?
options: A) Introduction to AI and ML
B) Roles in UI/UX design
C) Marketing strategies in tech
quiz._answer: A) Introduction to AI and ML

quiz.question: What is a focus on Day 9: Product Management?
options: A) Building a simple ML model for prediction
B) Real-life scenario: Creating a marketing plan
C) Role of a product manager in tech companies
quiz._answer: C) Role of a product manager in tech companies

quiz.question: What is discussed on Day 10: UI/UX Design?
options: A) Principles of good design and usability
B) Importance of network security
C) Introduction to emerging technologies
quiz._answer: A) Principles of good design and usability

quiz.question: What is covered on Day 11: Tech Marketing and Sales?
options: A) Key legal issues in tech
B) Marketing strategies in the tech industry
C) Introduction to cloud computing
quiz._answer: B) Marketing strategies in the tech industry

quiz.question: What topic is discussed on Day 12: Emerging Technologies?
options: A) Overview of emerging technologies like Blockchain and IoT
B) Basics of networking
C) Data collection and analysis
quiz._answer: A) Overview of emerging technologies like Blockchain and IoT

quiz.question: What is covered on Day 13: Ethics and Legal Considerations in Tech?
options: A) Roles in cloud computing
B) Key legal issues like data privacy and compliance
C) Creating a personal career development plan
quiz._answer: B) Key legal issues like data privacy and compliance

quiz.question: What is a key focus on Day 14: Career Pathways and Professional Development?
options: A) Importance of continuous learning and upskilling
B) Real-life scenario: Migrating an on-premises application
C) Creating a marketing plan for a tech product
quiz._answer: A) Importance of continuous learning and upskilling
